page.title: 18LUMB FAMILY WINDOW
page.content: {Interior,the Lumb Family window.}It was ordered there by {Charles Poynton {Lumb}a member of a well known family of Barwick-in-Elmet.On the Lumb window there are many scenes depicted.At the bottom on the left is William Lumb being crowned.On the left again but at the top this time there is the Bishop that crowned him. On the right hand side there is a battle going on at the base of the window and at the top there is a king.All these scenes are shown in beautiful colours. {The main window}faces the east. It shows Jesus seated on the throne of glory,crowned with a gold,ruby and diamond crown fixed together to show a beautiful crown of everlasting life.
